verses.text: Ix yalanxi winhaj Job chi' icha tik:
Ha ticnaic anheja' yel vav yuj in yaelal tik. Wach'chom tzin te k'acvi, palta anheja' yak'anoch in yaelal Dios.
Comonoc svojtaquejeli b'ajtil tz'ilchaj Dios chi' vuuj, tas pax tz'aj in k'och b'aj ay sdespacho.
Tato icha chi' tzam val t'ay yuj in yaelal tik, yujto tzijtum tas tzin nib'ej swal t'ay yuj in colan in b'a.
Tzin nib'ej svojtaquejeli tas ol yal t'ayin.
¿Tocval ol yak'lab'ej yip yic tzin scachanem numnajoc? Maay, ol smaclej yab' tas ol vala'.
Ol am yojtaquejeli to yel svala', ol am yalani to malaj in mul. Icham chi' ol aj in yak'anel t'a libre t'a junelnhej.
Tzin sayek' Dios t'a stojolal b'aj sjavi k'u, malaj ayek' ta'. Tzin saypaxek' t'a stojolal b'aj tz'em k'u, max ilchajpaxlaj vuj ta'.
Tzin sayek' t'a stojolal norte, max ilchajlaj vuuj. Anhejtona', tzin sayanxi t'a stojolal sur, max sch'ox pax sb'a t'ayin ta'.
Palta yojtac in b'eyb'al. Ayic ol lajvoc in yak'an proval, wach'xonhej ol in ajkan icha q'uen oro sb'o t'a cal k'ak'.
Ha jun b'eyb'al ix sch'oxcan t'ayin, malaj b'ak'uinh svactejcan in b'eyb'alani.
Tzin k'anab'ajejnhej schecnab'il yet' sk'ayb'ub'al. Ek'b'alxo yelk'och schecnab'il chi' t'a yichanh b'eyumal t'a yol in sat.
Ayic snaan Dios sk'ulan junok tasi, sk'ulejnhej, malaj junok mach syal scachanoch vaan.
Ha tas nab'il yuj sk'ulan t'ayin, sk'ulejnhej. Tzijtumto pax tas nab'il yuj t'a vib'anh.
Yuj val chi' tzin te xiv t'ay. Anhej tzin naancoti tzin te xivq'uei.
Ha Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil, yuj tz'el vip yuj xivelal.
Wach'chom maxtzac vil-laj yuj k’ik’ k’inal oyanoch t'a in patic, palta max in emlaj numan.
